text.value: Great news! Please continue to closely monitor baby.
Is baby still experiencing any danger signs?
Please indicate which danger signs is experiencing.
Difficulty breathing; too fast or too slow
Baby should visit the health facility immediately if she is experiencing any of these danger signs.
Please advise her to do so and accompany her if possible.
Did baby visit the health facility as recommended?
Condition of other children in household
Does the baby calm easily when crying?
How often is the baby feeding/eating?
What is the baby eating every day?
How often is the baby urinating? (at least 6-8x daily?)
Abdomen:( soft, no distension, no hernia)
Alert & Active: (normal cry, moves arms & legs equally)
Malaria prevention (mosquito net present, and gets used)
Problems noted in baby's health passport
If >6mo: Total kg of porridge given this visit
Total tins provided to household this visit
Signs of hunger/ infants feed every 2 -3 hrs

bind.calculate: if(selected(../fever, 'yes') or selected(../difficulty_breathing, 'yes') or selected(../not_nursing_well, 'yes') or selected(../greater_than_diapers, 'yes') or selected(../redness_umbilical_cord, 'yes') or selected(../cry_stopping, 'yes') or selected(../sunken_fontanel, 'yes') or selected(../watery_stools, 'yes') or, 'yes', if(selected(../fever, 'no') and selected(../difficulty_breathing, 'no') and selected(../not_nursing_well, 'no') and selected(../greater_than_diapers, 'no') and selected(../redness_umbilical_cord, 'no') and selected(../cry_stopping, 'no') and selected(../sunken_fontanel, 'no') and selected(../watery_stools, 'no'), 'no', ''))
